## MultiLineTextFieldDefinition type

Represents a multi-line text field definition (in a Schema).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MultiLineTextFieldDefinition = TextFieldDefinition & {
    DefaultValue?: string;
    Height?: number;
};
```
